abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32680950, pmid32681141, pmid32681654, pmid32680838, pmid32681166, pmid32680896, pmid32681674, pmid32687645, pmid32687455, pmid32686372, pmid32685980, pmid32680954, pmid32565584, pmid32680957, pmid32684183, pmid32600484, pmid32684187
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.22
